consent.title: Map Service & Privacy
consent.message: This map uses the external service HERE Maps. When loading the map, your IP address is transmitted to HERE. Please confirm your consent.
consent.ipAddress: IP address is transmitted to HERE Global B.V.
consent.location: Approximate location determination for map display
consent.noStorage: No storage of personal data on our servers
consent.revocable: Consent can be revoked at any time

fallback.title: Privacy Respected
fallback.message: You have not consented to the use of HERE Maps. Your privacy is important to us.

alternative.title: Alternative without external map:
alternative.search: Use our search function for transports
alternative.list: Browse current offers in list view
